name: Boo 2.0 - SkipBo / Spite & Malice Variant
description:
Boo is a variant of the popular strategic SkipBo / Spite and Malice card game.

Play and relax with some casual rounds or watch the ai play itself.

Whether 5 or 15 minutes, with 1-3 opponents and 5-30 cards, you can choose between short explosive rounds or tactical depth.
